res:
CON Welcome to SustainAShare program 
Log In as: 
1. Continue 
2. Exit

1*1.res:
CON Welcome {customer_name} 
1. Check my Donations 
2. Give Donation 
3. Opt out

1*1*1*1.res:
CON Customer Care will reach to you for Drop Off Details 
1. Exit

1*1*1*1*1.res:
END Thank you {customer_name} 
You will receive notification in {customer_name}

1*1*2.res:
CON Customer Care will reach to you for Drop Off Details  
1. Exit

1*1*3.res: CON Customer Care will reach to you for Delivery Details

1*1*2*1.res: END Thank You for Using SustainAShare
